alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pine and southwestern Burnett Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 944 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cambridge, to Center City, to Star Prairie, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine City, Rock Creek, Grantsburg, Trade Lake, Siren, Brook Park, Henriette, Branstad, Randall, Falun, Greely, Phantom Lake, Chengwatana State Forest, Four Corners, West Rock, Alpha, Trade River, Beroun, and Saint Croix State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Anyone at a campground should seek sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
